snippet: Raising the minimum wage is good politics and even better economics.
abstract: Editorial supports plan by Democrats for a nationwide campaign in 2014 for a higher minimum wage; contends advocating for a higher minimum wage is smart politics and good economics; urges Democratic Party to give the same support to other aspects of Pres Obama's inequality agenda.
lead_paragraph: Raising the minimum wage is good politics and even better economics.

headline.main: The Campaign for a Bigger Paycheck
headline.print_headline: The Campaign for a Bigger Paycheck
